title: Syndra's spells cast WAY too fast.
body: Syndra has so little counterplay it's fucking insane. I've never been able to beat a syndra in lane no matter what champion i play becaise he spells have a .1 second cast time and you definitely don't have enough time to walk out of. Not to mention that at rank 2 with 200 ap her ult does 800 damage and is point and click. The only way to not get hit by this champion's spells is to have an hourglass, 4 ludens, and mobility boots then you MIGHT not get hit.

replies.body: Wtf are you talking about Mr. Nonsense?
"What's this? An inference that some champ might be too good? I must dislike this immediately!"
Even platinum syndra mains are pretty crappy; how the hell do you lose to a bronze one.
I agree. She is super overpowered. OP is amazing and if even HE? Can't beat syndra?  Something is clearly wrong with the champ.

This is basically true. Winning lane against syndra is virtually impossible if you play normal mages, even with a champion that technically counters her - look at the stats on websites like matchup.gg and op.gg. Her constant nearly unavoidable poke is really absurd.

Your best bet is taking a mobile ranged champion or someone who can easily dodge her Qs without mana issues, and wait to outscale her.
